title: Did You Think Another World Would Motivate A NEET? - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Psychological   Romance   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Arrogant Characters   Beastkin   Clever Protagonist   Clumsy Love Interests   Cunning Protagonist   Demi-Humans   Devoted Love Interests   Discrimination   Elves   Game Elements   Genius Protagonist   Hackers   Heroes   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Knights   Lazy Protagonist   Loli   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Loyal Subordinates   Magic Formations   Magical Technology   Male Protagonist   Manipulative Characters   Master-Disciple Relationship   Master-Servant Relationship   Misunderstandings   Mysterious Past   Neet   Older Love Interests   Past Trauma   Persistent Love Interests   Polygamy   Rebellion   Reluctant Protagonist   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   S*aves   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   Summoned Hero   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World   Trap   Trickster   Tsundere   Underestimated Protagonist
author: Karino Mikata   刈野ミカタ
description: Suddenly summoned to another world, the teenage NEET, Houbami Reiji, is asked to fight for the summoner, Tifalycia Cleargreen, in Heroic War as a Hero for her race. Reiji refused outrightly, as it is natural that a NEET would not work. However, Tifalycia is not in a good situation currently, what will Reiji do to overcome the odds as he gets dragged into her situation? And it appears that Reiji is not a simple NEET as he seems on the surface.>
